languages.text: "Справедливо. Он совершил большую ошибку, доверив мне эту работу".
"This is fair. He made a huge mistake by trusting me with this mission."
languages.original_text: "Справедливо. Он совершил большую ошибку, доверив мне эту работу".

traits.locale_text: "This is fair. He made a huge mistake by trusting me with this mission."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: 「当然の結果だ。彼は俺にこの任務を任せるという、大きなミスを犯した」
languages.original_text: "This is fair. He made a huge mistake by trusting me with this mission."

traits.locale_text: 「当然の結果だ。彼は俺にこの任務を任せるという、大きなミスを犯した」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: “确实如此。他将这个任务托付给我，确实是个巨大的错误。”
languages.original_text: "This is fair. He made a huge mistake by trusting me with this mission."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。他将这个任务托付给我，确实是个巨大的错误。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: «Es cierto. Cometió un gran error al confiarme esta misión».
languages.original_text: "This is fair. He made a huge mistake by trusting me with this mission."

traits.locale_text: «Es cierto. Cometió un gran error al confiarme esta misión».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Das ist gerecht. Es war ein großer Fehler von ihm, dass er mir diese Mission anvertraut hat."
languages.original_text: "This is fair. He made a huge mistake by trusting me with this mission."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist gerecht. Es war ein großer Fehler von ihm, dass er mir diese Mission anvertraut hat."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas moi qui dirai le contraire. Me confier cette mission était une grossière erreur. »
languages.original_text: "This is fair. He made a huge mistake by trusting me with this mission."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas moi qui dirai le contraire. Me confier cette mission était une grossière erreur. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Maalesef. Bu görevde bana güvenerek büyük bir hata yaptı."
languages.original_text: "This is fair. He made a huge mistake by trusting me with this mission."

traits.locale_text: "Çok doğru. Bu görevde bana güvenerek büyük bir hata yaptı."
traits.speaker: WrackServant
